name: Irish cream and chocolate cheesecake
description: The smooth, creamy liqueur gives this celebration cheesecake the wow factor. Top with grated chocolate and a dusting of cocoa.
recipeIngredient: 25ml/1fl oz Baileys or other Irish cream liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a pan and add the crushed digestive biscuits. Mix well until the biscuits have absorbed all the butter.
